page.title: 16POPULATION / RELIGION
page.content: The approx population of Hodsall street in Meopham is 70.52 most of the people drive their own cars and 3 people are learning to drive.36 people attend school and 63 people do not think that they will move in the next 5 years.Most if not all of the people like living in Hodsall Street. RELIGION The Baptist Chapel was built in 1828 following a period when the founder had constructed their services in hired premises in Harvel Luddesdowne and Meopham. Elim church.As you enter through 2 small doors into a porch some 15metres long.The hall is 25 metres wide and 50 metres long with 9 windows and double doors.It is furnished with chairs,a table,piano,flower stand and a lecturn.another room houses a piano,chairs and storage space.
